main_page.short_description: I am a front-end developer with 3 years of experience, including one and a half years of commercial experience

descriptions.descriptions_text: I am a young promising front-end developer with 1.5 years of commercial experience

education_item_1.title: VASILKIV SPECIALIST COLLEGE OF NATIONAL AVIATION UNIVERSITY
education_item_1.text: During my studies I worked with languages ​​such as C++ and C#, took an advanced course in higher mathematics, analysis mathematics, equations differential, algebra linear, mathematics discrete and theory probability

education_item_2.title: ANDRZEJ FRYCZ MODRZEWSKI KRAKOW UNIVERSITY
education_item_2.text: During my studies I did so programming course in languages ​​such as php, C++ and Java, I learned to work with database using SQL and working with data statistics in R

achievement.title: My achievement
achievement.text: I was among 30 winners out of 8,600 participants All-Ukrainian competition "Aviator"

projects.title: My projects
projects.text: This is list of my personal projects

type_1.title: Layouts
type_1.text: My personal website designs, crafted with React and JavaScript, showcase not only my web development skills but also my ability to merge functionality with beauty, creating unique and visually appealing web projects.

type_2.title: Apps
type_2.text: My applications, including a weather app, a color picker app, and a data visualization tool, are crafted with precision and creativity using React and JavaScript, offering intuitive user experiences and practical functionalities.

type_3.title: Games
type_3.text: My games, including Tic Tac Toe and 2048, are meticulously designed and implemented using React and JavaScript, providing engaging gameplay and enjoyable experiences for players of all ages.

project_description.project_1: This is 2048 game writted on native js. You have to press arrow down, up, left and right to replace the numbers
project_description.project_2: This is tic tac game writted on react.js. To win you have to put three X or three O in a row, also you can change day and night mode

project_description.project_1: This is color app. You can choose you personal palette of colors, save it and share with your friends, For updating colors you have to press tab, for saving color you should to click on lock
project_description.project_2: This is weather app. You have to write your city and click the button
